marklogic.body: It is way past time to scrap this horrendous government agency which has turned out to be nothing more than a make work program for ghetto losers. They recruit from advertisements on pizza boxes, for Pete's sake! It is now a DAILY occurrence to hear about TSA physical abuses, mental abuses, scaring old folks and kids... Heck we are still taking our shoes Off to see if we have bombs in them. The TSA regularly FAILS Spot checks by allowing test weapons, bombs, and other munitions to slip past their "screeners". Their personnel regularly get busted for drugs, robbery, prostitution, and many other heinous crimes. Disband the whole agency; we don't need it THAT badly!
